unnormalised: Ha ha, fokot Bharotant tumkam konacheai nanvachea adim "Er." dista ani tankam ek jagtik panvddeacho software engineer mhunn umed asta! Gambhirponnan sanglear, Dr. Sharma sokollechea rosto maka ₹500 ekak hea chodd "experts" poros boro laptop thik korta.
normalised: Haha, fokot Bhartan tumkam konnacheanv nanvache poilim "Engineer" asa mhonn distolem ani tankam ek world-class software engineer mhonn chintun astolem! Gambhirponnan sangtat tor, Doctor Sharma rosteacher astana mhozo laptop choddh korun "experts" rupee panchshyan fodtat tea von bore bhaxen sarokh kortat.
text: Ha ha, fokot Bharotant tumkam konacheai nanvachea adim "Er." dista ani tankam ek jagtik panvddeacho software engineer mhunn umed asta! Gambhirponnan sanglear, Dr. Sharma sokollechea rosto maka ₹500 ekak hea chodd "experts" poros boro laptop thik korta.
